Common Solutions

VDI Reduction

What if instead of sending traffic to the moon and back with every click, all you needed to work safely was built into your browser

BYOD Workforce

Bring-your-own-device is a dream for end users, but a nightmare for security teams. The Enterprise Browser delivers the ideal work environmentâfull flexibility and total data protection.

3rd Party Onboarding

Full granular control and visibility for you. Complete security for your data. Simple, native access for contractors. All with the Enterprise Browser.

SaaS and web apps

SaaS and web apps gave us unprecedented flexibility, but took away control over our own data. The Enterprise Browser gives you both.

Privileged User Access

Eliminate human error and insider threats by adding a layer of visibility and control to any admin interaction. All without writing a single line of source code.

Zero Trust

Imagine your zero trust architecture powered by the browser itself.

Safe Browsing

The Enterprise Browser naturally protects organizations from the full scope of web threats, without distracting, delaying, or intruding on users.

Enable GenAI at work

Give your users the ability to use the tools, apps, and services they work with best, so they can innovate freely without opening the door to risk.

.timeline_wrapper{
	
}
.timeline_inner{
	
}
.timeline_active{
	
}
.timeline_image{
	max-height: 0;
	visibility: hidden;
	opacity: 0;
}
.timeline_image_active{
	min-height: 300px;
	visibility: visible;
	opacity: 1;
	transition: 2s all;
}
.pillars_image{
	height: 0;
}
.pillars_image.pillars_image_active{
	height: auto;
}
.pillars_image img{
	max-height: 0;
	visibility: hidden;
	opacity: 0;
}
.pillars_image_active img{
	min-height: 584px;
	visibility: visible;
	opacity: 1;
	transition: 2s all;
}

.timeline_active h3{
		color: #654FE8 !important;
    font-weight: 700 !important;
}
.timeline_active svg{
		height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
    margin-left: -4px;
    padding: 1px;
    border: 1px solid #654fe8;
    border-radius: 100%;
    margin-right: -3px;
		transition: 0.1s all;
}
.timeline_active svg circle{
    fill: #654FE8;
    fill-opacity: 1;
    border: 1px solid #654FE8;
		transition: 0.2s all;
}
.timeline_active_before svg circle{
		fill: #654FE8;
    fill-opacity: 1;
}
.timeline_inner1{
	
}
.timeline_inner2{
	
}
.timeline_inner_title{
	cursor: pointer;
}
.timeline_inner_text{
	transition: 1s all;
}
.timeline_inner_text > div{
max-height: 0;
    transition: 0.7s all !important;
    padding: 4px 0px 0 24px !important;
    min-height: 50px;
}
.timeline_active .timeline_inner_text > div{
    min-height: 130px;
		transition: 0.3s all;
}
.timeline_inner_text > div p{
		opacity: 0;
	transition: 0.3s all;
		
}
.timeline_active .timeline_inner_text > div p{
		opacity: 1;
		transition: 0.7s all;
}
.timeline_inner_text:before{
	content: '';
	background: rgba(101, 79, 232, 0.3);
	width: 1px;
	height: 100%;
	position: absolute;
	top: 3px;
	transition: 1s all;
}
.timeline_active .timeline_inner_text:before{
	background: #654FE8;
	transition: 1s all;
}
.timeline_active_before + .timeline_inner_text:before{
	background: #654FE8;
	transition: 1s all;
}
.timeline_inner_last .timeline_inner_text:before{
	display: none;
}

.home_page_timeline  .timeline_inner_title{
	padding-top: 32px;
}
.home_page_timeline  .timeline_inner_title{
	transition: 1s all;
}
.home_page_timeline  .timeline_inner_title > div{
max-height: 0;
    transition: 0.7s all !important;
    padding: 4px 0px 0 24px !important;
    min-height: 24px;
}
.home_page_timeline  .timeline_active .timeline_inner_title > div{
    max-height: 134px;
		transition: 0.3s all;
}

	padding-top: 0px;
}

 .home_page_timeline .timeline_active h3 {
font-family: 'Red Hat Display';
font-style: normal;
font-weight: 700;
font-size: 20px;
line-height: 20px;
/* identical to box height, or 100% */

letter-spacing: 1px;

}

.home_page_timeline .timeline_inner_title:hover h3{
	color: #654FE8 !important;
	font-style: normal;
	font-weight: 500;
	font-size: 20px;
	line-height: 20px;
}
.home_page_timeline  .timeline_inner_title > div p{
		opacity: 0;
	transition: 0.3s all;
		
}
.home_page_timeline  .timeline_active .timeline_inner_title > div p{
    opacity: 1;
    transition: 0.7s all;
    margin-top: 16px;
}
.home_page_timeline .timeline_inner_title:before{
    content: '';
    background: rgba(101, 79, 232, 0.3);
    width: 2px;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 3px;
    transition: 1s all;
}
.home_page_timeline .timeline_active .timeline_inner_title:before{
	background: #654FE8;
	transition: 1s all;
}

.home_page_timeline  .timeline_active .timeline_inner_title:before{
	background: #654FE8;
	transition: 1s all;
}
.timeline_active_before + .timeline_inner_title:before{
	background: #654FE8;
	transition: 1s all;
}
.home_page_timeline  .timeline_inner_last .timeline_inner_title:before{
	display: none;
}

	.custom-select,  #contact_us_form .custom-select{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    background-color: #fff;
    color: #363844;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    -moz-transition: all 0.2s ease-in;
    -o-transition: all 0.2s ease-in;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.2s ease-in;
    transition: all 0.2s ease-in;
    height: 48px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    align-items: center;
    border: 1px solid rgba(54,56,68,.25)!important;
    border-radius: 4px;
}

}

    max-height: 310px;

    top: 100%;
    width: 100%;

<script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    document.querySelectorAll(".custom-marquee").forEach(wrapper => {
      const track = wrapper.querySelector(".marquee-track");
      let scrollAmount = -track.scrollWidth / 2;
      const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 768;
      const speed = isMobile ? 0.2 : 0.6;

      function animate() {
        scrollAmount += speed;
        if (scrollAmount >= 0) {
          scrollAmount = -track.scrollWidth / 2; // reset to start
        }
        track.style.transform = `translateX(${scrollAmount}px)`;
        requestAnimationFrame(animate);
      }

      animate();
    });
  });
</script>

<script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const wrapper = document.querySelector(".custom-marquee-mob");
    const track = wrapper.querySelector(".marquee-track-mob");
    let scrollAmount = -track.scrollWidth / 2;
    const speed = 0.5; // Adjust if needed

    function animateMob() {
      scrollAmount += speed;
      if (scrollAmount >= 0) {
        scrollAmount = -track.scrollWidth / 2;
      }
      track.style.transform = `translate3d(${scrollAmount}px, 0, 0)`;
      requestAnimationFrame(animateMob);
    }

    animateMob();
  });
</script>

<script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const wrapper = document.querySelector(".custom-marquee-mob2");
    const track = wrapper.querySelector(".marquee-track-mob2");
    let scrollAmount = 0;
    const speed = 0.5; // Adjust speed as needed

    function animateMob2() {
      scrollAmount -= speed;
      if (Math.abs(scrollAmount) >= track.scrollWidth / 2) {
        scrollAmount = 0;
      }
      track.style.transform = `translate3d(${scrollAmount}px, 0, 0)`;
      requestAnimationFrame(animateMob2);
    }

    animateMob2();
  });
</script>

        	<form id="footer_newsletter_form" method="POST" novalidate data-hs-do-not-track="true">

			    <input type="hidden" id="source_browser" name="source_browser" value="">
			    <input type="hidden" id="user_ip_newsletter" name="user_ip" value="">

			    <div id="newsletter-form-step-1">
			        <div id="form-step-newsletter">

			            <label for="newsletter_email">Work Email*</label>
			            <input type="email" name="newsletter_email" id="newsletter_email" placeholder="Your Email Address*" required>


			            <button type="submit" id="footer-newsletter-btn" class="not_cutting_arrow">Subscribe
			            	<span id="form-loader-newsletter" class="loader-newsletter" style="display: none;"></span>	
			            </button>
			            
			        </div>

        <script>window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        jQuery(document).ready(function($) {

        	$.getJSON('https://guardz.com/ipify_api.php', function(e) {
			    user_ip = e.ip;
			    $('#user_ip_newsletter').val(user_ip);
			});

            var email_validation_flag = 0;
            // Function to perform real-time validation
	        // jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').on('input', function() {
	        //     jQuery.ajax({
            //         url: 'https://guardz.com/email_validate.php',
            //         method: 'POST',
            //         data: {
            //             api_key: '51e5714fa7934051b50f53d6213b8461',
            //             email: jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').val()
            //         },
            //         success: function(response) {
            //             // console.log(jQuery.trim(response));
            //             if(jQuery.trim(response) === 'true'){
            //                 // console.log('OK');
            //                 email_validation_flag = 1;
            //                 jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').next('ul').remove();
            //                 // submitButton.disabled = false;
            //             }else{
            //             	email_validation_flag = 0;
            //                 jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').next('ul').remove();
            //                 jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').after("<ul class='no-list hs-error-msgs inputs-list' role='alert'><li><label class='hs-error-msg hs-main-font-element'>Please enter a company email address.</label></li></ul>");
            //                 // submitButton.disabled = true;
            //             }
            //         },
            //         error: function(error) {
 
            //         }
            //     });
	        // });


	        function validateUserEmailNewsletter(userEmail) {
	            if (!userEmail) {
	                return 'Please enter a company email address.';
	            }
	            return '';  // No error
	        }

            // function validateEmail(email, callback) {
		    //     $.ajax({
		    //         url: 'https://guardz.com/email_validate.php',
		    //         method: 'POST',
		    //         data: {
		    //             api_key: '51e5714fa7934051b50f53d6213b8461',
		    //             email: email
		    //         },
		    //         success: function(response) {
		    //             callback(response.trim() === 'true');
		    //         },
		    //         error: function() {
		    //             callback(false);
		    //         }
		    //     });
		    // }

	        // $('#newsletter_email').on('input', function() {
	        //     handleLiveValidation(this, validateUserEmailNewsletter);
	        // });

	        // Function to validate the entire form
			function validateNewsletterForm() {
		        let isValid = true;
		        $('.hs-error-msgs').remove();

		        const userEmailValue = $('#newsletter_email').val();
		        if (!userEmailValue) {
		            isValid = false;
		            $('#newsletter_email').after("<ul class='no-list hs-error-msgs inputs-list' role='alert'>" +
		                "<li><label class='hs-error-msg hs-main-font-element'>Please enter a company email address.</label></li>" +
		                "</ul>"
		            );
		        }

		        return isValid;
		    }

	        function getCookieNewsletter(name) {
		        let value = "; " + document.cookie;
		        let parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
		        if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
		    }


		    $('#footer_newsletter_form').on('submit', function(e) {
		        e.preventDefault();

		        const isFormValid = validateNewsletterForm();
			    if (!isFormValid) {
			        console.log('Form is invalid. Fix the errors.');
			        return;
			    }

			    const userEmail = $('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').val();
			    $('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').next('ul.hs-error-msgs').remove();


			     $('#form-loader-newsletter').show();  // Show loader during validation


			     $.ajax({
			        url: 'https://guardz.com/email_validate_zero.php',
			        method: 'POST',
			        data: {
                        email: jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').val()
                    },
			        // dataType: 'json',
			        success: function(response) {
			        	const data = JSON.parse(response);
			            if (data.valid) {
			            	jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').next('ul').remove();
			                // ✅ Passed ZeroBounce — continue with form logic
			                $('#form-loader-newsletter').show();

			                // Remove anti-tracking flags
							$('#footer_newsletter_form').removeAttr('data-hs-do-not-track');

							// Trigger HubSpot to re-scan the form
							// if (window._hsq) {
							//     window._hsq.push(['recomputeForms']);
							// }


			                // Proceed with form submission after validation
				            console.log('Email is valid. Proceeding with form submission.');

				            const hubspotutk = getCookieNewsletter('hubspotutk');
				            const formData = {
				                'email': userEmail,
				                'utm_source': $('#utm_source').val(),
				                'utm_campaign': $('#utm_campaign').val(),
				                'utm_medium': $('#utm_medium').val(),
				                'utm_content': $('#utm_content').val(),
				                'utm_term': $('#utm_term').val(),
				                'source_device': $('#source_device').val(),
				                'source_browser': $('#source_browser').val(),
				                'user_ip': $('#user_ip_newsletter').val(),
				                'page_title_form': 'Footer',
				                'hs_context': $('#hs_context').val(),
				                'zeroBounce_status': data.status + ' ' + data.sub_status || 'unknown',
				                'hubspotutk': hubspotutk
				            };


			                // Make the AJAX request to submit the form
			                $.ajax({
			                    type: 'POST',
			                    url: 'https://guardz.com/mailer_hub_newsletter_form_api.php', // Replace with your PHP handler script URL
			                    data: formData,
			                    dataType: 'json',
			                    success: function(response) {
			                        if (response.status === 'success') {
			                        	$('#form-loader-newsletter').hide();
						                    if (response.status === 'success') {
						                        console.log('Form successfully submitted!');
						                        // Replace form with success message
						                        $('#footer-newsletter-container').html(`
						                            <div class="newsletter_success_msg">
						                                <img src="https://guardz.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/checkmark.svg" alt="Success">
						                                <h5 style="text-align: center;">Thanks for subscribing!</h5>
						                            </div>
						                        `);
						                    } else {
						                        console.log('There was an error submitting the form.');
						                    }

			                        } else {
			                        	$('#form-loader-newsletter').hide();
			                            // $('#form-status').html('<p>There was an error submitting the form.</p>');
			                            console.log('There was an error submitting the form.');
			                        }
			                    },
			                    error: function(xhr, status, error) {
			                    	$('#form-loader-newsletter').hide();
			                        // $('#form-status').html('<p>There was an error submitting the form.</p>');
			                        console.error('AJAX Error:', status, error);
			                    }
			                });

			            } else {
			                // ❌ Failed ZeroBounce
			                $('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').after(`
			                    <ul class='no-list hs-error-msgs inputs-list' role='alert'>
			                        <li><label class='hs-error-msg hs-main-font-element'>Please enter a company email address.</label></li>
			                    </ul>
			                `);
			                console.warn('Email failed ZeroBounce validation.');
			                // console.log(response || 'unknown');
			                // console.log(response.sub_status || 'none');
			                // 🔁 Collect form data again
							const fallbackFormData = {
							    'email': userEmail,
				                'utm_source': $('#utm_source').val(),
				                'utm_campaign': $('#utm_campaign').val(),
				                'utm_medium': $('#utm_medium').val(),
				                'utm_content': $('#utm_content').val(),
				                'utm_term': $('#utm_term').val(),
				                'source_device': $('#source_device').val(),
				                'source_browser': $('#source_browser').val(),
				                'user_ip': $('#user_ip_newsletter').val(),
				                'page_title_form': 'Footer',
				                'hs_context': $('#hs_context').val(),
							    // 'zeroBounce_status': 'rejected'
							    // ✅ Add ZeroBounce details
							    'zeroBounce_status': response || 'unknown'
							    // 'zeroBounce_sub_status': response.sub_status || 'none'
							};


							// ✅ Send to Make webhook
							$.ajax({
							    type: 'POST',
							    url: 'https://hook.eu2.make.com/q7qx63rx3sq66q9fp1g7k62ablad2n7u',
							    data: JSON.stringify(fallbackFormData),
							    contentType: 'application/json',
							    success: function(res) {
							        console.log('Fallback webhook sent successfully:', res);
							    },
							    error: function(xhr, status, error) {
							        console.error('Fallback webhook failed:', status, error);
							        console.error('Response:', xhr.responseText);
							    }
							});
			            }
			        },
			        error: function(err) {
			            console.error('ZeroBounce AJAX error', err);
			            jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').next('ul').remove();
            			jQuery('#footer_newsletter_form input[name="newsletter_email"]').after("<ul class='no-list hs-error-msgs inputs-list' role='alert'><li><label class='hs-error-msg hs-main-font-element'>There was an error with the email validation. Please try again later</label></li></ul>");
			        }
			    });
		    });


            // Show the popup on page load for testing
            // showPopupForm();
        });
        });</script>
	</div>

    <script type="rocketlazyloadscript">
        window.addEventListener('load', function () {
            // Delay execution to ensure performance metrics are populated
            setTimeout(function () {
                let domLoadTime = 0;
                let pageLoadTime = 0;

                if (performance.getEntriesByType && performance.getEntriesByType('navigation').length > 0) {
                    const navTiming = performance.getEntriesByType('navigation')[0];
                    domLoadTime = navTiming.domContentLoadedEventEnd - navTiming.startTime;
                    pageLoadTime = navTiming.loadEventEnd - navTiming.startTime;
                } else if (performance.timing) {
                    // Fallback to performance.timing
                    domLoadTime = performance.timing.domContentLoadedEventEnd - performance.timing.navigationStart;
                    pageLoadTime = performance.timing.loadEventEnd - performance.timing.navigationStart;
                }

                if (pageLoadTime === 0) {
                    console.warn('Page Load Time is still 0, using manual fallback.');
                    pageLoadTime = Date.now() - performance.timing.navigationStart;
                }

                console.log('DOM Load Time:', domLoadTime);
                console.log('Page Load Time:', pageLoadTime);

                // Push to dataLayer
                window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
                dataLayer.push({
                    event: 'performanceMetrics',
                    domLoadTime: domLoadTime,
                    pageLoadTime: pageLoadTime
                });
            }, 1000); // Delay execution by 1000ms
        });
    </script>

	<!-- Popup JavaScript -->
	<script>window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
	(function(){

	  jQuery('.custom-popup-content-left a.popup-button').on('click', function(e) {
		    // e.preventDefault(); // Optional: prevent default link behavior if needed
		    console.log('Popup button clicked:', jQuery(this).text());
			// window._conv_q = window._conv_q || [];
			// _conv_q.push(["triggerConversion", "100453187"]);
	  });

	  var popup = document.getElementById('custom-popup');
	  var popup2 = document.getElementById('custom-popup2');
	  var popupContent = document.querySelector('.custom-popup-content');
	  var popupContent2 = document.querySelector('.custom-popup-content2');
	  var savedScrollPosition = 0; // To store the scroll position when popup is shown

	  // Check if the cookie exists and then check its value
	    let cookieName = "_conv_v"; // Replace with your cookie name
	    let cookieValue = getConvCookie(cookieName);
	    let cookieValueForPreviewMode = getUrlParameter('convert_v');
	    var abTest_flag = 0;
	    let searchString = "1004339964"; // Replace with the string you're looking for

	    if (cookieValue !== undefined || cookieValueForPreviewMode !== undefined) {
	        console.log(cookieValue);
	        // Cookie exists, now check if it contains a specific string
	        if (cookieValueForPreviewMode == searchString || typeof cookieValue === "string" && cookieValue.includes(searchString)) {
	            // Cookie contains the desired string
	            console.log("Cookie exists and contains the desired string.");
	            abTest_flag = 1;
	        } else {
	            // Cookie exists but does not contain the desired string
	            console.log("Cookie exists but does not contain the desired string.");
	            abTest_flag = 0;
	        }
	    } else {
	        // Cookie does not exist
	        console.log("Cookie does not exist.");
	        abTest_flag = 0;
	    }


	    // Start polling for the cookie (every 1s, max 5 times)
		let checkCount = 0;
		let maxChecks = 3;
		let interval = setInterval(function () {
		  const cookieValue = getConvCookie(cookieName);

		  if (cookieValue && cookieValue.includes(searchString)) {
		    abTest_flag = 1;
		    console.log("Cookie detected during polling: AB test ON");
		    clearInterval(interval);
		    startPopupTriggers(); // start exit/scroll logic AFTER detection
		  } else {
		    checkCount++;
		    console.log("Check #" + checkCount + ": Cookie not found yet");

		    if (checkCount >= maxChecks) {
		      console.log("AB test cookie not found after 5 attempts.");
		      clearInterval(interval);
		      startPopupTriggers(); // proceed anyway
		    }
		  }
		}, 500);

		function startPopupTriggers() {
			// Scroll trigger
			window.addEventListener('scroll', function(){
			    if ( isPopupClosed() ) return;
			    var scrollTop = window.scrollY;
			    var docHeight = document.documentElement.scrollHeight - window.innerHeight;
			    if (docHeight > 0) {
			      var scrollPercent = (scrollTop / docHeight) * 100;
			      if (scrollPercent >= 50 && !popupContent.classList.contains('active')) {
			        if (getQueryParam('utm_source') === 'popupTest' || abTest_flag == 1) {
					  showPopupForAB();
					} else {
					  showPopup();
					}
			      }
			    }
			});

			// Exit intent trigger
			document.addEventListener('mouseleave', function(e){
			    if ( isPopupClosed() ) return;
			    if (e.clientY < 0 && !popupContent.classList.contains('active')) {
			        if (getQueryParam('utm_source') === 'popupTest' || abTest_flag == 1) {
					  showPopupForAB();
					} else {
					  showPopup();
					}
			    }
			});
		}


	    // Function to get the value of a cookie by name
        function getConvCookie(name) {
            let value = "; " + document.cookie;
            let parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
            if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
        }

        function getUrlParameter(sParam) {
            var sPageURL = window.location.search.substring(1),
                sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&'),
                sParameterName,
                i;

            for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
                sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');

                if (sParameterName[0] === sParam) {
                    return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? true : decodeURIComponent(sParameterName[1]);
                }
            }
            return false;
        }
	  
	  // Helper: Check if popup was already closed this session.
	  function isPopupClosed() {
	    return sessionStorage.getItem('popupShown') === 'true';
	  }
	  
	  // Show popup function: store scroll position and add active classes.
	  function showPopup() {
	    if ( isPopupClosed() ) return; // Don't show if already closed.
	    savedScrollPosition = window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
	    popup.classList.add('active');
	    popupContent.classList.add('active');
	    // Disable scroll on both body and html.
	    document.body.classList.add('no-scroll');
	    document.documentElement.classList.add('no-scroll');
	    // window._conv_q = window._conv_q || [];
		// _conv_q.push(["triggerConversion", "100493272"]);
	  }

	  // Show popup function: store scroll position and add active classes.

				$('select').each(function(){
					var $this = $(this), selectOptions = $(this).children('option').length;

					$this.addClass('hide-select'); 
					$this.wrap('<div class="select"></div>');
					$this.after('<div class="custom-select"></div>');

					var $customSelect = $this.next('div.custom-select');
					$customSelect.text($this.children('option').eq(0).text());
					// console.log($customSelect);
					var $optionlist = $('<ul />', {
						'class': 'select-options'
					}).insertAfter($customSelect);

					for (var i = 0; i < selectOptions; i++) {
						$('<li />', {
							text: $this.children('option').eq(i).text(),
							rel: $this.children('option').eq(i).val()
						}).appendTo($optionlist);
					}

					var $optionlistItems = $optionlist.children('li');

					$customSelect.click(function(e) {
						e.stopPropagation();
						$('div.custom-select.active').not(this).each(function(){
							$(this).removeClass('active').next('ul.select-options').hide();
						});
						$(this).toggleClass('active').next('ul.select-options').slideToggle();
					});

					$optionlistItems.click(function(e) {
						e.stopPropagation();
						$customSelect.text($(this).text()).removeClass('active');
						$this.val($(this).attr('rel'));
						$('.select').removeClass('elementor-error');
						$optionlist.hide();
					});

					$(document).click(function() {
						$customSelect.removeClass('active');
						$optionlist.hide();
					});

					$optionlist.hide();

					if($('body').hasClass('blog') && isMobile || $('body').hasClass('blog') && window_width < 1241 || $('body').hasClass('search') || $('body').hasClass('postid-56420') && isMobile || $('body').hasClass('postid-56420') && window_width < 1241){

				function init_blog_selection(){
// 						console.log('test');
						jQuery(".blog .select-options li").on("click", function(e) {
							e.stopPropagation();
						 console.log(jQuery(this).attr('rel'));



						$('.loader_wrapper').show();
						$( ".e-loop-item" ).each(function() {
							$(this).removeClass('hidden_item');
							$(this).removeClass('showing_item');
						});
						var cat_name = jQuery(this).attr('rel');
						window.history.replaceState(null, null, '?blog_filter='+ cat_name);	
// 						console.log(cat_name);
	//                  $( ".cat_inner" ).each(function() {
	//                      $(this).removeClass('active');
	//                  });
						$( ".e-loop-item" ).each(function() {
							$(this).addClass('hidden_item');
							$(this).hide();
						});
						$( ".e-loop-item" ).each(function() {
							if(cat_name == 'all' || cat_name == 'All'){
								$(this).show();
								$(this).addClass('showing_item');
							}
							else if($(this).find('a').hasClass(cat_name)){
								$(this).show();
								$(this).addClass('showing_item');
							}else{
	//                          $(this).fadeOut();
							}

							setTimeout(function() { 
								$('.loader_wrapper').fadeOut();
							}, 500);
						});

	//                  $(this).addClass('active');

						if($('body').hasClass('blog') || $('body').hasClass('search') || $('body').hasClass('postid-56420')){
							$(".blog_post_wrapper .elementor-grid").hide();
							$(".list-wrapper-temp").remove();
							$(".blog_post_wrapper .elementor-widget-loop-grid > div").append('<div class="list-wrapper-temp elementor-loop-container elementor-grid"></div>');
							var $clone = $(".blog_post_wrapper .elementor-grid").clone().children();
	//                      console.log($clone);
	//                      $(".list-wrapper").clone().appendTo($(".list-wrapper").parent());
							$(".list-wrapper-temp").html($clone);

							$( ".list-wrapper-temp .e-loop-item" ).each(function() {
								if($(this).hasClass('hidden_item') && !$(this).hasClass('showing_item')){
									$(this).remove();
								}
							});
							//Pagination JS
							var items = $(".list-wrapper-temp .e-loop-item.showing_item");
							var items_elements = $(".list-wrapper-temp .e-loop-item");
							//how much items per page to show
							var show_per_page = 6; 
							//getting the amount of elements inside pagingBox div
							var number_of_items = $('.list-wrapper-temp .e-loop-item.showing_item').size();
							if(number_of_items <= 6){
								$('#pagination-container_blog').hide();
							}else{
								$('#pagination-container_blog').show();
							}
							//calculate the number of pages we are going to have
							var number_of_pages = Math.ceil(number_of_items/show_per_page);

							//set the value of our hidden input fields
							$('#current_page').val(0);
							$('#show_per_page').val(show_per_page);

							//now when we got all we need for the navigation let's make it '

							/* 
							what are we going to have in the navigation?
								- link to previous page
								- links to specific pages
								- link to next page
							*/
							var navigation_html = '<a class="previous_link"><img class="ar ra" src="https://guardz.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Group-7578590.svg"></a>';
							var current_link = 0;
							while(number_of_pages > current_link){
								navigation_html += '<a class="page_link" longdesc="' + current_link +'"><span>'+ (current_link + 1) +'</span></a>';
								current_link++;
							}
							navigation_html += '<a class="next_link"><img class="ar la" src="https://guardz.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Group-757859.svg"></a>';

							$('#pagination-container_blog').html(navigation_html);

							//add active_page class to the first page link
							$('#pagination-container_blog .page_link:first').addClass('active_page');

							$('#pagination-container_blog').attr('data-pages', (number_of_pages - 1));

							$('#pagination-container_blog .previous_link').addClass('disabled');

							//hide all the elements inside pagingBox div
							$('.list-wrapper-temp').children('.e-loop-item').css('display', 'none');

							//and show the first n (show_per_page) elements
							$('.list-wrapper-temp').children('.e-loop-item').slice(0, show_per_page).css('display', 'block');

							jQuery(".page_link").on("click", function(e) {
								e.preventDefault();
								go_to_page($(this).attr('longdesc'));
							}); 

							jQuery(".next_link").on("click", function(e) {
								e.preventDefault();
								next();
							}); 
							jQuery(".previous_link").on("click", function(e) {
								e.preventDefault();
								previous();
							}); 
							//Pagination JS

							function previous(){

								new_page = parseInt($('#current_page').val()) - 1;
								//if there is an item before the current active link run the function
								if($('.active_page').prev('.page_link').length==true){
									go_to_page(new_page);
								}

							}

							function next(){
								new_page = parseInt($('#current_page').val()) + 1;
								//if there is an item after the current active link run the function
								if($('.active_page').next('.page_link').length==true){
									go_to_page(new_page);
								}

							}
							function go_to_page(page_num){
								$('.loader_wrapper').show();

								//get the number of items shown per page
								var show_per_page = parseInt($('#show_per_page').val());

								//get the element number where to start the slice from
								start_from = page_num * show_per_page;

								//get the element number where to end the slice
								end_on = start_from + show_per_page;

								//hide all children elements of pagingBox div, get specific items and show them
								$('.blog_post_wrapper .list-wrapper-temp.elementor-loop-container').children('.e-loop-item').css('display', 'none').slice(start_from, end_on).css('display', 'block');

								/*get the page link that has longdesc attribute of the current page and add active_page class to it
								and remove that class from previously active page link*/
								$('.page_link[longdesc=' + page_num +']').addClass('active_page').siblings('.active_page').removeClass('active_page');

								if($('#pagination-container_blog').attr('data-pages') == page_num){
									$('#pagination-container_blog .next_link').addClass('disabled');
								}else{
									$('#pagination-container_blog .next_link').removeClass('disabled');
								}

								if(page_num == 0){
									$('#pagination-container_blog .previous_link').addClass('disabled');
								}else{
									$('#pagination-container_blog .previous_link').removeClass('disabled');
								}

								//update the current page input field
								$('#current_page').val(page_num);
								setTimeout(function() { 
									$('.loader_wrapper').fadeOut();
									$('html, body').animate({
										scrollTop: $(".cat_wrapper").offset().top
									}, 400);
								}, 500);
							}

						}
						});
				}
		});
		
		var getUrlParameter = function getUrlParameter(sParam) {
			var sPageURL = window.location.search.substring(1),
				sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&'),
				sParameterName,
				i;

			for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
				sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');

				if (sParameterName[0] === sParam) {
					return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? true : decodeURIComponent(sParameterName[1]);
				}
			}
			return false;
		};
	}
